Those errors indicate a problem on startup.  If there was any visible
consequence of these errors then they should be immediately apparant, not
delayed as you suggested.  The provided stack traces are probably red herrings.
 Can you try to reproduce this problem using only Eclipse (not WSAD)?
Is this still a problem in 3.2?
